thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 01 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-India's Fortis Healthcare Gets Modified Investment Proposal From Munjals & Burmans

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-India's Fortis Healthcare Gets Modified Investment Proposal From Munjals & Burmans

organizations.name: fortis healthcare gets modified investment proposal from munjals & burmans

text:
May 1 (Reuters) - Fortis Healthcare Ltd:
* GETS MODIFIED INVESTMENT PROPOSAL FROM MUNJAL’S OFFICE AND BURMAN’S OFFICE TO INVEST DIRECTLY INTO CO
* REVISED BINDING OFFER TO INVEST 18 BILLION RUPEES DIRECTLY INTO CO
* OFFER INCLUDES INVESTMENT WORTH 8 BILLION RUPEES VIA PREFERENTIAL ISSUE OF EQUITY SHARES
* OFFER INCLUDES INVESTMENT OF 10 BILLION RUPEES VIA PREFERENTIAL ISSUE OF WARRANTS
* ALLOTMENT & PRICING FOR THE PREFERENTIAL ISSUE OF SHARES AT 167 RUPEES PER SHARE
* ALLOTMENT & PRICING FOR THE PREFERENTIAL ISSUE OF WARRANTS AT 176 RUPEES PER SHARE
* PROPOSAL FROM MUNJAL'S OFFICE AND BURMAN'S OFFICE PROPOSES STRATEGIC SALE OF CO'S SRL BUSINESS Source text - bit.ly/2FvJb8R Further company coverage:
